title: Update Campaign Budget
description: Schema for updating an existing campaign's budget

account_id.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no dashes)

campaign_resource_name.description: Full campaign resource name (alternative to campaign_id)

new_daily_budget_micros.description: New daily budget in micros (1,000,000 micros = 1 currency unit)

new_daily_budget_currency.description: New daily budget in actual currency. Will be converted to micros automatically

adjustment_value.description: Value for adjustment (percentage for PERCENT types, amount for AMOUNT types)
